text: Ion Predescu (2 October 1927 - 12 October 2020) was a Romanian lawyer and politician. From 2004 to 2013, he was a judge at the Constitutional Court of Romania. Between 1982 and 1986, he studied at The Law University at Bucharest. He was also a member of the Senate between 1990 to 2004. Predescu died on 12 October 2020, at the age of 93.A murit Ion Predescu, fost judecător constituţional şi senator PSD, anunţă CCR ==References== Category:2020 deaths Category:Romanian lawyers Category:Romanian judges Category:Romanian politicians Category:Constitutional Court of Romania Category:1927 births
title: Ion Predescu
